text: Adolfo "Fito" Ovalle (born April 28, 1997) is a Chilean footballer currently playing for Forward Madison on loan from Toronto FC II in USL League One. ==Career== ===Professional=== On March 6, 2015, Ovalle signed a homegrown contract with Real Salt Lake. On March 22, he made his professional debut with USL affiliate club Real Monarchs SLC in a 0–0 draw against LA Galaxy II. He was waived on April 28, 2016. On August 20, 2016, Ovalle signed a one-year deal with the Italian Lega Pro side Fidelis Andria. ===International=== Ovalle has represented Chile in the under-20 level. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean expatriate footballers Category:Chile under-20 international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Forward Madison FC players Category:Homegrown Players (MLS) Category:Real Monarchs players Category:Real Salt Lake players Category:Toronto FC II players Category:USL Championship players Category:USL League One players
title: Adolfo Ovalle
